remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供了灵活的方式在行和列中显示的数据集合。The control provides a flexible way to display a collection of data in rows and columns. 包括内置的列类型和用于承载自定义内容的模板列。The includes built-in column types and a template column for hosting custom content. 内置的行类型包括一个下拉列表的详细信息部分，可用于显示下面的单元值的其他内容。The built-in row type includes a drop-down details section that you can use to display additional content below the cell values. ## 绑定到数据Binding to Data 若要将绑定的数据，设置属性设置为实现。To bind the to data, set the property to an implementation. 数据网格中的每一行绑定到数据源中的对象和数据网格中的每个列绑定到数据对象的属性。Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object. 为了使添加到或源数据中删除项时自动更新的用户界面必须绑定到一个集合，其中实现接口，如。In order for the user interface to update automatically when items are added to or removed from the source data, the must be bound to a collection that implements the interface, such as an . 若要自动反映属性的更改，源集合中的对象必须实现接口。To automatically reflect property changes, the objects in the source collection must implement the interface. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md). ## 列Columns 默认情况下控件生成列自动设置时属性。By default, the control generates columns automatically when you set the property. 生成的列的类型取决于列中的数据类型。The type of column that is generated depends on the type of data in the column. 下表列出了生成的列类型。The following table lists the generated columns types. |生成的列类型Generated Column Type|数据类型Data Type| |---------------------------|---------------| ||| ||| ||| ||| 下图显示了每个列类型。The following illustration shows each of the column types. ![与所有四个默认列类型的 DataGrid](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid 与所有四个默认列类型")![DataGrid with all four default column types](~/add/media/ndp-datagriddefault.png "DataGrid with all four default column types") 自动生成列时，可以处理事件，以便自定义或取消列添加到之前。When columns are auto-generated, you can handle the event to customize or cancel columns before they are added to the . 如果添加用户定义的列和自动生成列，首先添加的用户定义的列。If you add both user-defined columns and auto-generated columns to the , the user-defined columns are added first. 若要重新排列这些列的显示顺序，可以设置各个列的属性。To rearrange the display order of the columns, you can set the property for individual columns. 可以通过设置阻止自动生成列属性设置为`false`。You can prevent automatic column generation by setting the property to `false`. 这是很有用，如果你想要创建和显式配置的所有列。This is useful if you want to create and configure all columns explicitly. 使用类型来定义自定义列，如果内置的列类型不能满足你的需求。Use the type to define a custom column if the built-in column types do not meet your needs. 类型提供了和，可以指定用于显示和编辑模式的内容模板的属性。The type provides and properties that enable you to specify content templates for both display and editing modes. 例如，可以用于日期定义自定义列。For example, you could define a custom column for dates. 可以定义以显示日期，并可以定义控件，以编辑日期。The could define a to display a date, and the could define a control to edit the date. 可以使用要以编程方式添加、 插入、 删除和在运行时更改控件中的任何列集合。You can use the collection to programmatically add, insert, remove, and change any columns in the control at run time. 检查属性来确定某列是否自动生成或用户定义的。Check the property to determine whether a column is auto generated or user defined. 自动生成的列将自动添加，已删除或重新生成时更改。Auto-generated columns will be automatically added, removed, or regenerated when the changes. ## 选择Selection 默认情况下，当用户单击中的单元格选择整行，用户可以选择多个行。By default, the entire row is selected when a user clicks a cell in a , and a user can select multiple rows. 可以设置属性来指定用户可选择单元格、 整行，或两者。You can set the property to specify whether a user can select cells, full rows, or both. 设置属性来指定多个行或单元格可以选择，还是仅单个行或单元格。Set the property to specify whether multiple rows or cells can be selected, or only single rows or cells. 可以获取有关从选择的单元格信息属性。You can get information about the cells that are selected from the property. 可以获取有关为其所选内容中已更改的单元格的信息的事件。You can get information about cells for which selection has changed in the of the event. 调用或方法以编程方式选择或取消选择所有单元格。Call the or methods to programmatically select or unselect all cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认键盘和鼠标行为 DataGrid 控件中](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-behavior-in-the-datagrid-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Behavior in the DataGrid Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-behavior-in-the-datagrid-control.md). ## 分组、 排序和筛选Grouping, Sorting, and Filtering 默认情况下，您可以对项进行排序在通过单击列标题。By default, you can sort items in a by clicking the column header. 你可以自定义排序通过处理事件。You can customize sorting by handling the event. 若要取消的默认排序，请设置属性设置为`true`。To cancel the default sort, set the property to `true`. 您还可以进行排序的源数据中显示之前。You can also sort the source data before it is displayed in the . 为进行分组、 排序和筛选器中的数据，则将绑定到支持这些操作的实现。To group, sort, and filter data in the , you bind the to an implementation that supports these operations. 然后执行集合视图上的操作。You then perform the operations on the collection view. 项中的分组时，可以定义，它指定每个组的外观。When items are grouped in the , you can define a that specifies the appearance of each group. 您将应用通过将其添加到的集合。You apply the by adding it to the collection of the . 如果有多个级别的分组，可以将不同的样式应用到每个分组级别。If you have multiple levels of grouping, you can apply different styles to each group level. 样式中定义的顺序应用。Styles are applied in the order in which they are defined. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：分组、 排序和筛选数据的 DataGrid 控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Group, Sort, and Filter Data in the DataGrid Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-group-sort-and-filter-data-in-the-datagrid-control.md). ## 编辑Editing 默认情况下，您可以编辑项目中直接。By default, you can edit items directly in the . 若要保证可以提交并取消是否正确中的对象的编辑必须实现接口。To guarantee that edits can be committed and canceled correctly, the objects in the must implement the interface. 或者，可以设置属性设置为`true`禁用中编辑。Alternatively, you can set the property to `true` to disable editing in the . 对以下编辑命令提供内置支持：The has built-in support for the following editing commands: |命令Command|默认输入的绑定Default Input Binding| |-------------|---------------------------| ||F2F2| ||EscESC| ||EnterENTER| ||DELETEDELETE| 将当前单元格置于编辑模式通过单击它或按 F2。You put the current cell into edit mode by clicking it or pressing F2. 移动到同一行中的另一个单元或单元格处于编辑模式时按 enter 键时，就会提交对单元格级别编辑。A cell-level edit is committed when you move to another cell in the same row or press ENTER while the cell is in edit mode. 移动到另一个行或行处于编辑模式时按 enter 键时，将提交行中的所有编辑。All edits in a row are committed when you move to another row or press ENTER while the row is in edit mode. 您通过一次，按 ESC 取消单元格编辑，并按 esc 键两次取消行中的所有编辑。You cancel a cell edit by pressing ESC one time, and cancel all edits in a row by pressing ESC two times. 有关以编程方式提交和取消编辑详细信息，请参阅， ，和方法。For more information about programmatically committing and canceling edits, see the , , and methods. 有关与编辑相关的事件的详细信息，请参阅， ， ，和。For more information about edit-related events, see , , , and . 设置和属性来指定用户是否可以添加或删除行。Set the and properties to specify whether a user can add or delete rows. 用户可以通过按 DELETE 键删除所选的行。A user can delete selected rows by pressing the DELETE key. 如果属性设置为`true`，作为中的最后一行添加新项行。If the property is set to `true`, a new item row is added as the last row in the . 您可以通过处理设置的新项的默认值事件。You can set default values for new items by handling the event. > [!NOTE] > 是否允许编辑操作会受到其他因素，包括各种并状态的，以及有关基础数据集合是否允许该操作。Whether editing actions are allowed is influenced by a variety of additional factors, including the and state of the , and whether the underlying data collection allows the action. ## 验证Validation ，可在单元格和行级别执行验证。The enables you to perform validation at both the cell and row level. 与单元格级别验证时用户更新的值验证绑定的数据对象的各个属性。With cell-level validation, you validate individual properties of a bound data object when a user updates a value. 使用行级验证时用户将更改提交到行验证整个数据对象。With row-level validation, you validate entire data objects when a user commits changes to a row. 您也可以通过设置行级验证错误提供自定义可视反馈属性，也可以使用默认错误指示符。You can provide customized visual feedback for row-level validation errors by setting the property, or you can use the default error indicator. 若要创建自定义验证规则，请创建派生的类类，实现方法。To create a custom validation rule, create a class that derives from the class and implement the method. 添加到自定义验证规则集合。Add the custom validation rule to the collection. ## 自定义数据网格控件Customizing the DataGrid Control 控件支持常见的表格格式设置选项，如交替行背景和要显示或隐藏标头，网格线，滚动条的功能。The control supports common table
